text: (dutare,) heliri; nanantu khanditavagiyu nanna odeyana kadeyinda toralagiruva spasta sanmargadalliddene mattu nivu adannu sullendu tiraskarisuttiruviri. Nivu yavudakkagi atura paduttiruviro adu (a divya sikse) nanna kaiyallilla. Adhikaravu kevala allahanobbanige seride. Avane satyavannu tilisuttane mattu avane atyuttama tirpu niduvavanagiddane
